repos_url.name: Charts
repos_url.description: Create and publish beautiful charts based on simple spreadsheets

repos_url.name: JahiApp-Newsletter
repos_url.description: Jahia template module that enables newsletter subscription management features.

repos_url.name: Google-Search
repos_url.description: Search into your website using Google Search

repos_url.name: Stickers
repos_url.description: Draggable & droppable stickers to put on your pages to help contributors

repos_url.name: QR-Code
repos_url.description: This module - provided by SOPRA development team - will create a QR code for a related content.

repos_url.name: Slideshow-Colorbox
repos_url.description: This JahiApp - provided by SOPRA development team - allow you to create your own slide show on your website. This module based on Colorbox plugin (http://colorpowered.com/colorbox) delivers different themes, transition modes, automatic slideshow, etc.  Module displays thumbnail gallery on your page and when you clic show pictures in lightbox mode. See demo on http://colorpowered.com/colorbox/core/example1/index.html     To play with it :  -          Instal it on your jahia  -          Just drag’n drop slideshow module to your page  -          Configure slideshow parameters (Theme, type and transition time, size of thumbnails images, etc.)  -          Add every images you want  -          Preview page and start to play :)

repos_url.name: ImageServicePicker
repos_url.description: A module coming from SMILE team - Allow a user to select and display images from an image services (Picasa, Flickr, ...)

repos_url.name: Facebook
repos_url.description: Using RESTFB library, to provide Facebook Connect (SSO), Graph API (display data), ...

repos_url.name: Extented-GoogleMap-module
repos_url.description: A module from Logica team – Replace the standard location module. Extends possibilities to bind with lists of contents and make it WAI friendly.

repos_url.name: Visitor-IP-Data
repos_url.description: This module - provided by SOPRA development team - will show some visitors related data according their IP.

repos_url.name: Code-Highlighter
repos_url.description: Syntax coloration for many programming languages

repos_url.name: izpack
repos_url.description: IzPack Git repository (Julien Ponge - project lead branches)

repos_url.name: LastRegisteredUsers
repos_url.description: This module - provided by Oshyn - lists the last registered users in the system. It offers the custom field numberUsers in order to configure the number of last registered users to display.

repos_url.name: SQLDisplay
repos_url.description: This module - from Oshyn Team - displays the results performed by queries and it contains the capability to paging the results.  It offers three custom fields: 1)selectStatement: Field to enter the sql query 2) dataSource: the data source that is going to be used to execute  the query and 3) pageSize: the number of items per page

repos_url.name: XSLT-Transformation
repos_url.description: This Jahia module allows you to transform XML into XHTML using XSLT. You can set your XML / XSL source by choosing URI, file or by entering your code inline

repos_url.name: Paypal-Gateway
repos_url.description: This module can be used to donate or pay on Paypal
